attributes.review: I was scratching my butt (as any alien would) when my cat was running away then I wondered what would trump do so I tried to grab it. And the cat ran away. also this app is garbage where the arcade games at man.
attributes.title: Not useful or helpful

attributes.review: The app called me a fat gargantuan hippo and Mike Pence came out of the app and put his pp into my pp (which has erectile dysfunction). I felt so violated but he persisted. 10/1000000 wouldn’t recommend to anyone!!! 🙏🌚🌚🚨👨‍🦯👨‍🦯🙃😏😛😏🙃🤣😦😰😬😥😬🥵😪😤🤲👹😽👹🎃👺😹👇🦿☝️👋🤞🤛🏻🤘👤🧑👱‍♂️👥👵👦🏼🧔👦🏼👵👩‍🦰👨‍🔬👩‍👧👨‍👩‍👦👩‍👧‍👧👩‍👩‍👧‍👦👔⛑🩱🧤🥿🐮🦆 blm
attributes.title: Horrid

attributes.review:
if I could give it -10393933902 stars I would!!! this app crashed everytime I tried opening it. once I finally got it open it made my entire phone crash and restart. 🤥 it also is super confusing on how to use and none of the features worked on it. also this app was made by a Cheeto man and I personally HATE CHEETOS. 😡😡😡
anyway #settleforbiden✨💗☺️
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app took my 4 days to download and I do not have time in my schedule to wait for this.It kept asking for address like it was gonna send me a pizza.Told me to pay 5000 to DONATE, Like I don’t even have 5000 DOLLARS.LASTLY my dogs tried to use the app and they went to the HOSPITAL.AND TRUMP IS TRYING TO TAKE DOWN TIKTOK.IN CONCLUSION,THIS APP IS HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app is just bad in general. bad graphics and just a homophobic and racist person against it -359579384722947593928474/10 😐🥱🤮
attributes.title: makes no sense.

attributes.review: i’d rate it 0 if i could. whatever you do please do not download this horrible terrible horrid disgusting awful yucky ewww app :) first of all the app took long to download. why is that? secondly when you open the app you are required to give your mobile phone number THATS TERRIBLE so i put in my “number” (444)444-4444 ~ hmu guys ;) ✨🙈 ~ only for it to ask me for a frikin PIN VERIFICATION SENT TO THE GOSH DARN NUMBER WHATTT so not only did i not receive the pin. i can’t find out the stupid things that are being said on the app bc i’m not giving my info bc i’m ᵘⁿᶜᵒᵐᶠʸ ʷⁱᵗʰ ᵗʰᵉ ᵉⁿᵛⁱʳᵒⁿᵐᵉⁿᵗ ʷᵉ ʰᵃᵛᵉ ᶜʳᵉᵃᵗᵉᵈ ⁱⁿ ᵗʰᵉ ᵃᵖᵖ ᵗᵒᵈᵃʸ. so i am disappointed, dissatisfied, i disapprove, 10/10 would not recommend! also i hate the pic they used for trump makes him look chunky-er than normal. but his foundation wasn’t half bad 👍🏻 (almost used the brown emoji hand can’t have that round here GAFAHFAHABAHA) iykyk. anyways my pet fish was walking today with me to the pet store and i saw a bird so i got it a leash but it didn’t like it so we went home to bedazzle it so now it’s better it wanted some chicken nuggies. it didnt❤️💫 TRUMP 2020 but on a tombstone!
attributes.title: I AM BEYOND DISSATISFIED

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app it asked if i wanted notifications, i said no because i’m usually pretty busy and don’t want interruptions. ALL night i was getting dings and alerts from this app. even on do not disturb mode. Mr.trump must’ve made it so his notifications ALWAYS go through. and that’s not even the beginning. i shared the app multiple times with many people, they proved that they downloaded it so i should have hundreds of points right? nope, there’s none. it’s all a big hoax to get his app out there. do not download!!!
attributes.title: never again

attributes.title: S o p h i a

attributes.review: I saw this app in an add on a youtube video and thought it would help me see a different opinion of trump. It is set up badly, slanders other political parties and candidates, as well as promoting racism. Was not impressed. Nothing good about it. Definitely will be calling hq about this!
attributes.title: Z E R O  S T A R S
